body.processed:
Why work with IBM Ventures?

Let's partner to co-create the great start-ups of tomorrow. We can help you start and scale through our extensive network.

Partnerships and Alliances

  • Go to market with the right resources, information and infrastructure
  • IBM and BloomReach work together to help retailers enhance their organic search marketing
  • IBM partners with IQP to deliver a complete code-free end-to-end IoT service to clients

Entrepreneurs in Residence: Create new companies with the support of IBM’s advisors, experts and network

R&D Collaboration: Push the boundaries of science and technology in collaboration with IBM Research and IBM clients

Licensing: Open new revenue opportunities with one of the world’s largest IP portfolios and the know-how of 250,000 technical experts around the world

Incubators: MindUP is a digital health incubator focused on improving the quality and efficiency of healthcare delivery

Investments: Apttus Announces Investment from IBM

Acquisitions: IBM Acquires Optevia, Expanding Role as Solutions Provider for Public Sector Clients
